events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund for it.
The support system identified this issue as related to refund requests after analyzing the customer's message.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's incorrect order.
Hello! I'm Anna, and I will assist you today with your refund. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, please send a photo of the item you received and confirm the order number.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached photos of the item that was delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate how fast you are handling this.
The refund request has been processed successfully and a confirmation email was sent to your registered email address.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help with.
Since you have confirmed the refund was successful, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete a short survey about your recent support experience.
